answers.answer: I've just entered the 2nd trim, im 15w2d, so far it has been OK and I have 3 appointments so dar, one at 16 weeks to check heartbeat, blood pressure etc and my 20 week scan and my 21 week antenatal class! I expect midwife will want to see my again about 22 weeks as well :Dxx

The 2nd trimester is a lot better for me than the 1st trimester.  I'm not sick hardly just gaging every morning.  I didn't think I'd feel my baby move until the 3rd trimester because I am a plus size woman but let me tell you I feel him everyday move.  I am 24w3d.  He's moving as I type.  It's the best feeling.  He loves when I eat Mexican food and play Nickleback in the car.  I hope the rest of your pregnancy goes good for you.  Enjoy every minute of it.  Take care.

i'm seeing the doctor every 4 weeks still (i'm almost 27 weeks). the third trimester starts at 28 weeks. during the second trimester you'll go for your anatomy scan at around 20 weeks, and if you want, you'll have an opportunity to learn the sex of the baby. Towards the end of the second trimester, you'll have your glucose screen to check for gestational diabetes (mine's on monday). you'll start feeling the baby move in about a month. i started to feel very scattered, light movement around 16/17 weeks, and began to feel more definite movement in weeks 18 and 19 (although i have read some don't feel it til later). you're gonna pop, and start getting huge :) and towards the second half of the second trimester you're going to start packing on the pounds.i've had a great second trimester- lots of energy and feeling great. i hope it's the same for you!!!! only negatives are heartburn (but i take a prescription for that), and it gets rough to sleep. i recommend getting a snoogle sooner than later. i got one last week, and i wish i had it sooner. oh yea- and my feet just started to swell like crazy, but i guess that's from both the heat and being 26 weeks.

I am at 19wks now. With normal pregnancies you go to the doctor about every 4wks, unless you are high risk, like me, then its every two wks. I haven't had a whole lot of issues so far. I had some bad heartburn in the beginning, but with medicine I got it to go away. You get bigger of course. Sleep becomes a challenge because the baby will let you know when he/she is uncomfortable. I sleep propped up on about 4 pillows lol. I felt 1st movement at 16wks and nothing again till 18wks. Now at 19wks I feel movement every now and then, usually atleast once a day. I just can't wait in a few more wks it will be much more distinct. Uhm.... other than that. Yeah there is the big scan at around 20wks. Mine's actually at around 21 1/2 weeks. Any other questions just ask us.... Congratulations and welcome to 2nd trimester!
